title: I can't join a Teambuilder Match with Cassiopeia
body: 12 Minutes waiting with Cassiopeia, Middle Lane and Mage. I have only to wait around 2 minutes with any other mage. Fix the bug please.

replies.body: Its not a bug. The new Cass is bad. Really bad. She is the only champ I would say is complete and total garbage right now. Even Urgot has his merits.

There are far more likely reasons than "it's a bug";

1) People are declining you because they don't want a mage with a currently low winrate.
2) The particular time you're trying to queue up, mid laners could be high-supply/low-demand.

I think it's just #1. All you have to do is create your own match. You'll be ready to go in just a couple minutes.
